TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed ADODC/EOFActionEnum extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 屬性相容的常數。

span.span: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 6.0`EOFAction`屬性用來判斷何種動作`ADODC`時採用`EOF`屬性為 true。In Visual Basic 6.0, the `EOFAction` property was used to determine what action the `ADODC` takes when the `EOF` property is true. 這些常數可啟用從 Visual Basic 6.0，才能繼續執行而不需額外修改已升級的程式碼。These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification. > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adDoAddNew = int32(2)

summary.span: 若移動超過最後一筆資料錄，將會在目前資料錄上觸發 的 事件，接著觸發自動 ，最後在新資料錄上觸發 事件。

span.span: Moving past the last record triggers the 's event to occur on the current record, followed by an automatic , followed by a event on the new record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adDoMoveLast = int32(0)

summary.span: 將最後一筆資料錄保留為目前資料錄。

span.span: Keeps the last record as the current record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC/EOFActionEnum adStayEOF = int32(1)

summary.span: 若移動超過 的結尾，將會在最後一筆資料錄上觸發 的 事件，接著在無效的 () 資料錄上觸發 事件。

span.span: Moving past the end of a triggers the 's event on the last record, followed by a event on the invalid () record.

summary.span: 這時， 上的 [移到下一個] 按鈕是停用的。

span.span: At this point, the **MoveNext** button on the is disabled.
